message.body: Hello textpal of the day. Is there an inside story to your name, or is it just silliness?
Part of my last and first name combined
I am guessing you like to quilt
Yes, I studied with a teacher when I was little and just started doing it again.
Your name sounds like you're a little gnome who surprise hugs people
That's awesome!
Not a gnome but do like people
It would be so nice to be a surprise higher, we're it not for muggers and sexual predators, sigh. How are we to spread gratuitous love?
That is a good question. Smiling helps
Oops, I meant surprise hugger. I'm driving through West Virginia, and there are flashing lights in the sky. Any theories?
Mystical fireworks from mars?
I'll add it to the list. We also have heat lightning and mountain top removal blasts.
Yuck. Mountain top removal is bad
True. I think we're at the epicenter. If you don't think about that, it's just very pretty here.
I saw a talk by an intellectual lady last summer about cracking, Freud, and the subconscious.
She said that the tracking made her interpret the landscape as sinister and she could never see it as lovely again.
Oops, I mean fracking. Damn autocorrect
Interesting. I saw a comnercial supporting natural gas that i did not believe. A farmer said that his drinking water is safe
Hahahaha that's hilarious. Well, if he has a large enough acreage to lease to the drillers, he would have a great incentive to say so.
He would. And if it is large enough maybe his is but his cows is not safe to drink
Yes, or neighbors who don't even have the option . Your property has to be a minimum size to rent.
